snippet: There's little to distinguish the hybrids from their conventional donor cars, and that's the way BMW wants it to be.
abstract: There's little to distinguish the hybrids from their conventional donor cars, and that's the way BMW wants it to be.
lead_paragraph: Shown on Monday, Jan. 9: 2012 BMW ActiveHybrid 5 and ActiveHybrid 3.

headline.main: BMW Puts Hybrid Drive in Its Sporting Sedans
